title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Man, environment and ecosystems. Their inter relationships. Types of environmental pollutants, their sources and effects. Indoor pollution, Air pollution, sources, quantities, effects and controls technologies. Noise pollution. Industrial wastes, and their treatment. Solid wastes, generation, collection, processing and disposal.Environmental impact assessment and auditing. Introduction to Environmental laws and policies. Global issues on environment.
